name: hook [GMTK jam 2021]
description:
You can use hook for moving things like barrels or fire extinguishers around Controls use WASD or arrowkeys  for move around How to use the Hook 1 - use left click for create a support for your hook
2 - use left click again for extend the cable
3-  use rigth clik for contract the cable
4 - use left-click  for third time to recover the hook

for playing  please decompress the .rar archive, and excute GMTK game jam 2021.exe

i'm sorry i didn't add a way to close the game so please use  Alt+ F4 


At this time the game lacks a finishing state so the hammers is the last level for now Thanks

a special thanks to Luis Romero who make the character movement, also to CraftPix.net 2D Game Assets for that awsome art that we use in our project

Future

I think the game should be improved, so when the game is over I will be maintaining the project and leaving it in a state worthy of you as players
